message.content:
cs.SY, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.PL

This paper presents a framework for synthesizing control policies for nonlinear dynamical systems using Signal Temporal Logic (STL) specifications. The paper focuses on the use of optimization algorithms to efficiently compute control policies, which suggests that it may belong to the Robotics (cs.RO) or Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel smooth and differentiable quantitative semantics for STL, which could be of interest to researchers in the Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), or Programming Languages (cs.PL) sub-categories. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.SY and cs.RO, followed by cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.PL.
